'''The Emanant Skylight''' are three locations in [[Enkanomiya]]. These locations notably have a pool with [[Ghostfish]] during [[Evernight]]. Using these Ghostfish will lift the Traveler up towards a [[Time Tunnel]] which will take them to one of the three Locus subareas.

The Ghostfish will not appear, even during Evernight, until the Traveler has started the [[The Three Great Martial Trials]] World Quest.

The Emanant Skylights are guarded by Bathysmal Vishaps:
*{{Enemy|Primordial Bathysmal Vishap|x=1}}
*{{Enemy|Primordial Bathysmal Vishap Hatchling|x=2}}
